vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.6;
father of: Meshullam (H4918S)
§ Besodeiah = "with the counsel of Jehovah" or "in the secret of the Lord"
father of one of the repairers of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Mesulam, reconstructor del muro, post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比所玳 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "帶著耶和華的謀略" 或者 "在耶和華的隱密中"
尼希米時代耶路撒冷城牆修復者之一的父親 ( #尼3:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比所玳 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "带着耶和华的谋略" 或者 "在耶和华的隐密中"
尼希米时代耶路撒冷城墙修复者之一的父亲 ( #尼3:6)
